scripts.pkg:install: pnpm i && cd auth && pnpm i && cd ../admin && pnpm i && cd ../manager && pnpm i && cd ../member && pnpm i && cd ../chat && pnpm i && cd ../home && pnpm i && cd ../backend && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd auth && pnpm run dev" "cd admin && pnpm run dev"  "cd manager && pnpm run dev"  "cd member && pnpm run dev"  "cd chat && pnpm run dev" "cd home && pnpm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
